actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 with regard to the definition of "township".

summary.text: Provides that the government of a township which has no unit of local government (other than itself) located within it shall be treated neither as a county government nor a township government for purposes of the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972. (Amends 31 U.S.C. 1227)

titles.title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 with regard to the definition of "township".
